meanings.definition: The quality of being willing to take risks or try new things.
meanings.sent1: Her adventurousnesses led her to explore unknown lands.
meanings.sent2: His adventurousnesses in trying new foods always amazed his friends.
meanings.sent3: The adventurousnesses of the cat trying to catch a laser pointer entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The adventurousnesses of the young entrepreneur in starting a new business was like diving into uncharted waters.
meanings.sent5: The adventurousnesses of the astronaut venturing into space left a lasting impression on the world.

meanings.definition: The state of being adventurous or daring.
meanings.sent1: Their adventurousnesses in skydiving showed their fearless spirit.
meanings.sent2: The group's adventurousnesses during the camping trip made it unforgettable.
meanings.sent3: The adventurousnesses of the squirrel trying to steal birdseed from the feeder was comical.
meanings.sent4: The adventurousnesses of the mountain climber reaching the summit was like conquering a great challenge.
meanings.sent5: The adventurousnesses of the child exploring the forest made the experience magical.
